tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt: 62nd qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: 2012: Made two out of nine cuts on the Gateway Pro Tour...Won the Iowa Open. Shot rounds of 70-67-67 in the 54-hole event to defeat Patrick Duffy by a stroke at Lake Panorama National.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was a two-time Nebraska state individual champion at St. Mary's High School...Was a member of the 2009 NCAA national championship team at Texas A&M.
tourBios.personal: Favorite golf memory was making his first hole-in-one on the day before his home course was renovated (the hole no longer exists)...Never travels without his iPad...Twitter account is @johnhurleygolf...Would be a airline pilot if he were not a golfer...Not many people know he can't swim.
tourBios.otherInfo: Won twice on the Dakota Tour and won the Iowa Open.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T45th in 2012 at the Cox Classic Presented by Lexus of Omaha.
